lazyTrees

Class FoothillTunesStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • lazyTrees.FoothillTunesStore

  • public class FoothillTunesStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a music playlist scenario of removing and adding songs to a store's tunes. Implements BST with lazy deletion to keep track of total tunes ("deleted" + non deleted) and current tunes (non deleted only).

    • Field Summary

      • showFirstAndLastSong

        public void showFirstAndLastSong(java.lang.String message)

      • displayTunesState

        protected void displayTunesState(java.lang.String message,
                                 boolean showTree)
        Shows the state of the tree by displaying: - the *hard* tunes, which includes deleted nodes. - the *soft* tunes, which excludes deleted nodes.
        Parameters:
        message - Additional details about the state.
        showTree - Set to true if we want to display the contents of the tree
